node.title: The most useless key on my keyboard is:
node.author: davido

data.field: PrtSc/Sys Req (huh?) Scroll Lock Caps Lock (always leave it off) Caps Lock (ALWAYS LEAVE IT ON) Pause/Break The 'Windows' key (because I run Linux) The 'Mac' key (same reason) # (comments are for sissies) F12 (hard enough to remember what F1 does) Esc (I prefer to face my demons head on) Backspace (I never make mistakes)
